Title: Why IVF Labs Need Environmental Monitoring Systems to Protect Patients and Compliance
Summary: IVF labs today face higher expectations than ever before. More patients are turning to assisted reproductive technologies, and with that growth comes increased scrutiny from regulators, accrediting bodies, and patients themselves. Every embryo and sample entrusted to your lab represents a familyâ€™s future, and maintaining confidence means ensuring nothing is left to chance.
